thread.title: Road: A1 (M) South Yorkshire lane closed due to accident

author: itv.com
title: Road: A1 (M) South Yorkshire lane closed due to accident
text:
One lane is closed on the A1 (M) in South Yorkshire and there are reports of slow moving traffic due to an accident.
It happened on the southbound carriageway between junction 38 A638/A1 Doncaster by-pass and junction 37 A635 Barnsley Road.
Motorists are being urged to avoid the area.
Last updated Sat 4 Jul 2015 Travel South Yorkshire
